events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position, including their resume and cover letter.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster due to keywords such as 'software engineer' and 'developer' found in their profile.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's hiring process moving forward.
The initial screening interview was conducted successfully, assessing the candidate's background and technical skills relevant to software development.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback and expressed strong interest in proceeding to the technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the engineering team to evaluate their coding and system design skills in more detail.
